mapper.select: select count (*) FROM (select f.facilityCode, name, state, f.themeCode,originalMainFilename,saveMainFilename, memo from facility f left join theme t on f.themeCode = t.themeCode where gubunCode=1 and f.themeCode= #{code})
select facilityCode, name, state, originalMainFilename,saveMainFilename, memo from facility where gubunCode=1

select waiting from facility f left join ridesState r on f.facilityCode = r.facilityCode left join theme t on f.themeCode = t.themeCode where gubunCode=1 and timezone=#{hh} and to_char(recordDate,'yyyymmdd')=#{yyyymmdd} and f.themeCode= #{code}
